resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
Last item in the spending section that reveals the military role of the baillif. Indeed, we learn that the baillif paid himself 22 crossbowmen that then joined the count's army.
Moreover, we can trace back the journey of this small troup because they left Lille to go to Saint-Omer.
Saint Omer nowadays : <a href="https://www.google.fr/maps/place/Saint-Omer/@50.6668149,2.5255709,9.17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x47dcf893912760af:0x40af13e8163d5e0!8m2!3d50.7501421!4d2.2521973" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://www.google.fr/maps/place/Saint-Omer/@50.6668149,2.5255709,9.17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x47dcf893912760af:0x40af13e8163d5e0!8m2!3d50.7501421!4d2.2521973
resource.chars:
Last item in the spending section that reveals the military role of the baillif. Indeed, we learn that the baillif paid himself 22 crossbowmen that then joined the count's army.

Moreover, we can trace back the journey of this small troup because they left Lille to go to Saint-Omer.

Saint Omer nowadays : https://www.google.fr/maps/place/Saint-Omer/@50.6668149,2.5255709,9.17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x47dcf893912760af:0x40af13e8163d5e0!8m2!3d50.7501421!4d2.2521973

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Conclusion of the account listing the wages that are owed to the baillif not only for his standard work, but also for some extraordinary spendings listed above.
resource.chars: Conclusion of the account listing the wages that are owed to the baillif not only for his standard work, but also for some extraordinary spendings listed above.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: This sheet of parchment is most interesting becasue we can note what could be describe as a scar. Indeed, the parchment has been sewed up in order to preserve the integrity of the register. It is a proof that this register was considered by the Chambre des Comptes not only like a working tools, but also has an evidence of the baillif work in case of judiciary need.
resource.chars: This sheet of parchment is most interesting becasue we can note what could be describe as a scar. Indeed, the parchment has been sewed up in order to preserve the integrity of the register. It is a proof that this register was considered by the Chambre des Comptes not only like a working tools, but also has an evidence of the baillif work in case of judiciary need.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Note added by the officers of the Chambre des Comptes concerning the wages of the Receveur Général de Flandres given by the baillif.
resource.chars: Note added by the officers of the Chambre des Comptes concerning the wages of the Receveur Général de Flandres given by the baillif.
